TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TreeWalker extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供用來巡覽使用者介面自動化樹狀目錄的方法和屬性。

span.span: Provides methods and properties used to navigate the UI Automation tree.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者介面自動化用戶端檢視[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]做為一組在桌面上的項目排列在樹狀結構中的物件。UI Automation clients view the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elements on the desktop as a set of objects arranged in a tree structure. 使用類別，用戶端應用程式可以瀏覽[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]樹狀目錄中選取的樹狀結構檢視，然後從一個逐步到另一個指定的方向，使用， ， ，，和方法。Using the class, a client application can navigate the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree by selecting a view of the tree and stepping from one to another in a specified direction using the , , , , and methods. 瀏覽[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]使用可能會導致跨處理序的呼叫，並做為尋找元素的使用效率或方法。Navigating the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree using can result in cross-process calls and is not as efficient as locating an element using the or methods. 如果您的用戶端應用程式可能會嘗試尋找的項目在其自己的使用者介面中，您必須讓所有[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]個別執行緒上呼叫。If your client application might try to find elements in its own user interface, you must make all [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] calls on a separate thread.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Windows.Automation.Condition condition) cil managed

param.name: condition
param.span: 將巡覽之 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]項目樹狀目錄的檢視。

span.span: The view of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element tree that will navigate.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 不相符的項目`condition`跳過當用來瀏覽項目樹狀結構。elements that do not match `condition` are skipped over when is used to navigate the element tree. 如果您的用戶端應用程式可能會嘗試尋找的項目在其自己的使用者介面中，您必須讓所有[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]個別執行緒上呼叫。If your client application might try to find elements in its own user interface, you must make all [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] calls on a separate thread. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建構，只有在已啟用的項目之間巡覽。The following example shows how you can construct a that navigates only among enabled elements. [!code-csharp[UIAClient_snip#174](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/CSharp/ClientForm.cs#174)] [!code-vb[UIAClient_snip#174](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/VisualBasic/ClientForm.vb#174)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您的用戶端應用程式可能會嘗試尋找的項目在其自己的使用者介面中，您必須讓所有[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]個別執行緒上呼叫。If your client application might try to find elements in its own user interface, you must make all [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] calls on a separate thread. ## Examples 下列範例所示用來建構樹狀結構檢視中的樹狀子目錄的項目。The following example shows being used to construct a tree view of elements in a subtree. 使用方式完全相同。The usage for is identical. summary.span: 擷取所指定 的第一個子項目。

span.span: Retrieves the first child element of the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以有額外的子項目不符合目前的檢視狀態，因此不會傳回瀏覽項目樹狀結構時。An can have additional child elements that do not match the current view condition and thus are not returned when navigating the element tree. 結構樹狀結構變更為可見[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]桌面變更的項目。The structure of the tree changes as the visible [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] elements on the desktop change. 不保證項目，傳回第一個子項目會傳回第一個子系為後續傳遞。It is not guaranteed that an element returned as the first child element will be returned as the first child on subsequent passes.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement GetFirstChild(class System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement element) cil managed
Public Function GetFirstChild (element As AutomationElement) As AutomationElement

param.name: element
param.span: 要從中擷取第一個子系的項目。

span.span: The element from which to retrieve the first child.

summary.span: 擷取所指定 的第一個子項目。

span.span: Retrieves the first child element of the specified .

returns.span: 第一個子項目，如果沒有此項目，則為 Null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 )。

span.span: The first child element, or a null reference ( in Visual Basic) if there is no such element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以有額外的子項目不符合目前的檢視狀態，因此不會傳回瀏覽項目樹狀結構時。An can have additional child elements that do not match the current view condition and thus are not returned when navigating the element tree. 結構樹狀結構變更為可見[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]桌面變更的項目。The structure of the tree changes as the visible [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] elements on the desktop change. 不保證項目，傳回第一個子項目會傳回第一個子系為後續傳遞。It is not guaranteed that an element returned as the first child element will be returned as the first child on subsequent passes. ## Examples 下列範例所示用來建構樹狀結構檢視中的樹狀子目錄的項目。The following example shows being used to construct a tree view of elements in a subtree. summary.span: 擷取所指定 的父項目。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 結構樹狀結構變更為可見[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]桌面變更的項目。The structure of the tree changes as the visible [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] elements on the desktop change. 不保證項目傳回做為父系後續傳遞傳回父項目。It is not guaranteed that an element returned as the parent element will be returned as the parent on subsequent passes.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement GetParent(class System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement element) cil managed
Public Function GetParent (element As AutomationElement) As AutomationElement

span.span: The element whose parent is to be returned.

summary.span: 擷取所指定 的父項目。

span.span: Retrieves the parent element of the specified .

returns.span: 父項目，如果指定的項目為樹狀目錄的根項目，或在目前檢視中看不到父項目，則為 Null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 )。

span.span: The parent element, or a null reference ( in Visual Basic) if the specified element is the root element in the tree, or if the parent element is not visible in the current view.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例所示用來尋找視窗項目，其中包含指定的項目。The following example shows being used to find the window element that contains a specified element. [!code-csharp[UIAFocusTracker_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAFocusTracker_snip/CSharp/FocusTracker.cs#102)] [!code-vb[UIAFocusTracker_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAFocusTracker_snip/VisualBasic/FocusTracker.vb#102)]

Public Function GetParent (element As AutomationElement, request As CacheRequest) As AutomationElement

span.span: The element whose parent is to be returned.

param.name: request
param.span: 快取要求物件，指定在傳回的 中要快取的成員。

span.span: A cache request object specifying members on the returned to cache.

summary.span: 擷取指定之 的父項目並快取屬性和模式。

span.span: Retrieves the parent element of the specified and caches properties and patterns.

returns.span: 父項目，如果指定的項目為樹狀目錄的根項目，或在檢視中看不到父項目，則為 Null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 )。

span.span: The parent element, or a null reference ( in Visual Basic) if the specified element is the root element in the tree, or the parent element is not visible in this view.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 結構樹狀結構變更為可見[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]桌面變更的項目。The structure of the tree changes as the visible [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] elements on the desktop change. 不保證項目傳回做為父系後續傳遞傳回父項目。It is not guaranteed that an element returned as the parent element will be returned as the parent on subsequent passes.

summary.span: 擷取所指定 的上一個同層級項目。

span.span: Retrieves the previous sibling of the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以有其他的同層級項目不符合目前的檢視狀態，因此不會傳回瀏覽項目樹狀結構時。An can have additional sibling elements that do not match the current view condition and thus are not returned when navigating the element tree. 結構樹狀結構變更為可見[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]桌面變更的項目。The structure of the tree changes as the visible [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] elements on the desktop change. 不保證項目，傳回上一個同層級項目將會傳回與前一個同層級後續傳遞。It is not guaranteed that an element returned as the previous sibling element will be returned as the previous sibling on subsequent passes.

span.span: Retrieves the previous sibling of the specified .

returns.span: 前一個同層級項目，如果沒有此項目，則為 Null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 )。

span.span: The previous sibling element, or a null reference ( in Visual Basic) if there is no such element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以有其他的同層級項目不符合目前的檢視狀態，因此不會傳回瀏覽項目樹狀結構時。An can have additional sibling elements that do not match the current view condition and thus are not returned when navigating the element tree. 結構樹狀結構變更為可見[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]桌面變更的項目。The structure of the tree changes as the visible [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] elements on the desktop change. 不保證項目，傳回上一個同層級項目將會傳回與前一個同層級後續傳遞。It is not guaranteed that an element returned as the previous sibling element will be returned as the previous sibling on subsequent passes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以有其他的同層級項目不符合目前的檢視狀態，因此不會傳回瀏覽項目樹狀結構時。An can have additional sibling elements that do not match the current view condition and thus are not returned when navigating the element tree. 結構樹狀結構變更為可見[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]桌面變更的項目。The structure of the tree changes as the visible [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] elements on the desktop change. 不保證項目，傳回上一個同層級項目將會傳回與前一個同層級後續傳遞。It is not guaranteed that an element returned as the previous sibling element will be returned as the previous sibling on subsequent passes.

summary.span: 在此 執行個體使用的樹狀檢視中，擷取最接近指定之 的祖系項目。

span.span: Retrieves the ancestor element nearest to the specified in the tree view used by this instance of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 元素會藉由瀏覽樹狀目錄中的祖系鏈結，直到符合檢視條件的項目正規化物件為止。The element is normalized by navigating up the ancestor chain in the tree until an element that satisfies the view condition for the object is reached. 如果已到達根項目，即使它不符合檢視條件，會傳回根項目。If the root element is reached, the root element is returned even if it does not satisfy the view condition. 這個方法可用於取得參考的應用程式[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]點擊測試的項目。This method is useful for applications that obtain references to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elements by hit-testing. 應用程式可能會想要只使用特定類型的項目，而且可以使用，確定無論何種項目一開始擷取 （例如，當在捲軸上可取得輸入的焦點），則只有 （例如內容感興趣的項目最後會擷取項目）。The application might want to work only with specific types of elements, and can use to make sure that no matter what element is initially retrieved (for example, when a scroll bar gets the input focus), only the element of interest (such as a content element) is ultimately retrieved.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement Normalize(class System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement element) cil managed
Public Function Normalize (element As AutomationElement) As AutomationElement

param.name: element
param.span: 要做為正規化起點的項目。

span.span: The element from which to start the normalization.

summary.span: 如果節點符合 ，則擷取節點本身，或是擷取符合 的最近父代或祖系節點。

span.span: Retrieves the node itself, if it satisfies the , or the nearest parent or ancestor node that satisfies the .
The nearest in the current view.

returns.span: 如果向上巡覽祖系鏈結時到達根項目，則會傳回根項目。

span.span: If the navigation up the ancestor chain reaches the root element, the root element is returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 元素會藉由瀏覽樹狀目錄中的祖系鏈結，直到符合檢視條件的項目正規化物件為止。The element is normalized by navigating up the ancestor chain in the tree until an element that satisfies the view condition for the object is reached. 如果已到達根項目，即使它不符合檢視條件，會傳回根項目。If the root element is reached, the root element is returned even if it does not satisfy the view condition. 這個方法可用於取得參考的應用程式[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]點擊測試的項目。This method is useful for applications that obtain references to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elements by hit-testing. 應用程式可能會想要只使用特定類型的項目，而且可以使用，確定無論何種項目一開始擷取 （例如，當在捲軸上可取得輸入的焦點），則只有 （例如內容感興趣的項目最後會擷取項目）。The application might want to work only with specific types of elements, and can use to make sure that no matter what element is initially retrieved (for example, when a scroll bar gets the input focus), only the element of interest (such as a content element) is ultimately retrieved.

returns.span: 如果向上巡覽祖系鏈結時到達根項目，則會傳回根項目。

span.span: If the navigation up the ancestor chain reaches the root element, the root element is returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 元素會藉由瀏覽樹狀目錄中的祖系鏈結，直到符合檢視條件的項目正規化物件為止。The element is normalized by navigating up the ancestor chain in the tree until an element that satisfies the view condition for the object is reached. 如果已到達根項目，即使它不符合檢視條件，會傳回根項目。If the root element is reached, the root element is returned even if it does not satisfy the view condition. 這個方法可用於取得參考的應用程式[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]點擊測試的項目。This method is useful for applications that obtain references to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elements by hit-testing. 應用程式可能會想要只使用特定類型的項目，而且可以使用，確定無論何種項目一開始擷取 （例如，當在捲軸上可取得輸入的焦點），則只有 （例如內容感興趣的項目最後會擷取項目）。The application might want to work only with specific types of elements, and can use to make sure that no matter what element is initially retrieved (for example, when a scroll bar gets the input focus), only the element of interest (such as a content element) is ultimately retrieved.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.TreeWalker RawViewWalker
Public Shared ReadOnly RawViewWalker As TreeWalker

summary.span: 表示預先定義的 ，其中包含樹狀目錄中所有項目的檢視。

span.span: Represents a predefined containing a view of all the elements in the tree.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您的用戶端應用程式可能會嘗試尋找的項目在其自己的使用者介面中，您必須讓所有[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]個別執行緒上呼叫。If your client application might try to find elements in its own user interface, you must make all [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] calls on a separate thread. ## Examples 下列範例所示用來建構樹狀結構檢視中的樹狀子目錄的項目。The following example shows being used to construct a tree view of elements in a subtree. 使用方式完全相同。The usage for is identical. [!code-csharp[UIAClient_snip#171](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/CSharp/ClientForm.cs#171)] [!code-vb[UIAClient_snip#171](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/VisualBasic/ClientForm.vb#171)]
